subject: We received your CFO services inquiry
preheader: Thank you John Smith, we have received your inquiry about fractional CFO services and will contact you within 24 hours.
hero_subtitle: Our team will review your details and reach out within 24 hours to discuss how BlueCrest Group can support your business's financial strategy.
footer_note: This confirmation is a transactional email related to your inquiry. We respect your privacy and will never share your information.

lead.name: John Smith
lead.projectDescription: We're a Series A startup that has grown to $5M ARR and need strategic financial guidance. Looking for help with financial planning, board reporting, and fundraising preparation for our Series B round.
